member.name: IObjectWithCancelEvent.GetCancelEvent
member.summary: Retrieves an event that will be sent when an operation is canceled.
member.param: Pointer to a handle that, when this method successfully returns, is the handle to the cancel event. The caller is responsible for closing this handle when it is no longer needed.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Supplies a caller with an event that will be signaled by the called object to denote cancellation of a task.
